title: MarketWatch: Will Home Prices Drop in 2022? What the Experts Say
description: In 2021, competition for homes was fierce, and prices reached records. Now, mortgage rates are rising, and the housing market is cooling. MarketWatch's Jacob Passy speaks with Mark Fleming, chief economist for First American Financial Corporation.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: In 2021, competition for homes was fierce, and prices reached records. Now, mortgage rates are rising, and the housing market is cooling. MarketWatch's Jacob Passy speaks with Mark Fleming, chief economist for First American Financial Corporation.
